Package es.uniovi.reflection.weaver.dynamicGeneration

Classes necessary to create dynamically generated classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Wrapper
    Wrapper interface used to nest different types of dynamic generators.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDynamicGenerator
    Specific and base implementation of the Wrapper interface.
    DefaultComponentGenerator
    Wrapper implementation used as basic device for dynamically generate methods that are not woven yet.
    DynamicExceptionHandlerGenerator
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods and constructors when the non-basic after-throwing advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorAfter
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods, getters or setters when after advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorAround
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods when around advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorBefore
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods, getters or setters when before advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorConstructorAfter
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven constructors when after advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorConstructorBefore
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven constructors when before advice type is required.
    DynamicGeneratorForSingleObjectsGeneric
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods when instance-level weaving is required.
    DynamicGeneratorManager
    Class to handle the dynamic class generation process.
    DynamicNameFieldGenerator
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods when the aspect method receives member name information as argument.
    DynamicStatefulGenerator
    Wrapper implementation to dynamically generate woven methods when stateful aspects are required.
    MyClassLoader
    Class that extends java.lang.ClassLoader to load dynamically generated or modified classes into memory.
    OpcodesUtil
    Static class used by the dynamic generators to get specific information relating java.lang.Class objects with different kinds of VM opcodes.

Package es.uniovi.reflection.weaver.dynamicGeneration Description

Classes necessary to create dynamically generated classes. Dynamically generated methods in these classes will substitute old class method references stored in the callsites. Every time a pointcut is declared and created by the Weaver class, one of these dynamically generated classes is generated.
Version:
1.1.0
Author:
Oscar Rodriguez-Prieto Date: 2017/07/11
